title: GMR Institute of Technology: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: GMR Institute of Technology Admission 2024 is open for various courses. GMR Institute of Technology Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on GMR Institute of Technology Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

basic_info.name: GMR Institute of Technology Highlights
description: Also Check GMR Institute of Technology Courses and Fee Structure

basic_info.name: GMR Institute of Technology Admission B.Tech Admission
description: The institute offers full-time 4 years B.Tech program (Bachelor of Technology) in 8 different specializations namely- Chemical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering and Power Engineering.

The basic eligibility for B.Tech program is class in science stream with not less than 50% marks. The selection is done on the basis of AP EAMCET followed by counselling which is conducted by the institute itself.

basic_info.name: GMR Institute of Technology Admission M.Tech Admission
description: GMR Institute provides full-time 2 years M.Tech (Master of Technology) at postgraduate level. The college offers M.Tech program in 7 disciplines. To be eligible for admission to this program, applicants should have B.E./ B. Tech degree in relevant discipline with at least 50% marks.

Admission to M.Tech program is done on the basis of AP PGECET score. Shortlisted candidates on the basis of their marks obtained in AP PGECET are required to participate in counselling process which is conducted by the college. Applicants having valid GATE score are exempted from appearing AP PGECET.

description: The Central Library including eight departmental libraries together supports the research, teaching &extension programmes of the college.

basic_info.name: Hostel
description: Hostel facilities at GMR were started in 1998. It has enabled separate housing for boys and girls. The present strength of hostel is 1000+.
Girls Hostel - It has two blocks "Vamsadhara" and "Nagavali" with a capacity to accommodate 444 students.
Boys Hostel - The boy’s hostel comprises of five blocks ‘Vindhya’, ‘Satpura’, ‘Aravali’, ‘Nilgiri’and Himalaya. The present capacity of Boys’ hostel is 1083.

Section.name: About GMRIT
Section.description:
GMR Institute of Technology is an engineering college located in Andhra Pradesh, India. It is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada. GMRIT provides its learning community state-of-the-art facilities, infrastructure and a competent faculty. The Institute encourages collaborative learning between industry and academia as a means of reinforcing its curriculum with practical and real-world experiences.
The institute offers B.Tech and M.Tech programs in multiple specializations. GMR Institute of Technology Admission is done on the basis of entrance exams namely- AP EAMCET and AP PGECET. It also accepts GATE score for M.Tech admission.
Established year
1997
Type of Institute
Private (Autonomous)
Approved by
All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC)
Affiliated to
Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada
Campus area
Over 155 acres
Courses
B.Tech and M.Tech
Location
GMR Nagar, Srikakulam District Rajam - 532127 Andhra Pradesh, India
How to reach
about 100 km from Vishakhapatnam
Also Check GMR Institute of Technology Courses and Fee Structure
The institute offers full-time 4 years B.Tech program (Bachelor of Technology) in 8 different specializations namely- Chemical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering and Power Engineering.
The basic eligibility for B.Tech program is class in science stream with not less than 50% marks. The selection is done on the basis of AP EAMCET followed by counselling which is conducted by the institute itself.
GMR Institute provides full-time 2 years M.Tech (Master of Technology) at postgraduate level. The college offers M.Tech program in 7 disciplines. To be eligible for admission to this program, applicants should have B.E./ B. Tech degree in relevant discipline with at least 50% marks.
Admission to M.Tech program is done on the basis of AP PGECET score. Shortlisted candidates on the basis of their marks obtained in AP PGECET are required to participate in counselling process which is conducted by the college. Applicants having valid GATE score are exempted from appearing AP PGECET.
